document.full_text: avery diubaldo, a high school senior from denver, writes: "while some teens may balk at hearing that they've picked up the mannerisms and habits of their parents, i see it as a compliment, and as a point of pride."
document.title: giving thanks to parents
lines_and_colors: avery diubaldo, a high school senior from denver, writes: "while some teens may balk at hearing that they've picked up the mannerisms and habits of their parents, i see it as a compliment, and as a point of pride."
